description: Combining chilli, lime and jalapenos, this marinade packs a flavour punch. Add it to your next barbeque fish dish for extra zing.
keywords: Marinade & rubs,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Low sugar,Nov 2020,Sesame free,Halal,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Jalape√±o And Lime Marinade Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Process all ingredients and 1/2 tsp salt in a food processor for 20 seconds or until well combined. Use to marinate chicken thigh or breast fillets, firm white fish fillets or salmon fillets.
